title: Chasing the Holy Grail with Release Management
sessionTitle: Chasing the Holy Grail with Release Management
eventShortDescription: ​Indiana Jones had a great adventure when he was searching for the Holy Grail. But hey… software development is not far behind, especially if your deployment procedure requires manual steps. You can feel sweat dripping off your forehead before you go to production and there’s always a chance you’ll step on a broken board. Exciting, isn’t it? Not really. It’s time you start releasing your software with confidence and enjoy watching Indiana on TV rather than being in his shoes at 3 AM at work. This session will show you how easy it is to fully automate your deployment procedure using Release Management.
